title: Medical English Academic Writing and Literature Reading Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and General English Reading Comprehension Skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education for adult learners with practical medical field experience

learning_goals: Enhancement of abstract writing skills using specialized medical terminology
Systematic writing according to the international academic paper structure (IMRaD)
Cultivation of syntactic analysis and core content summarization skills for complex medical sentences
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
